toggleOverwrite.title: Overwrite Existing Data
toggleOverwrite.description: Allow the plugin to overwrite token data if new gazes are found.

toggleCleanup.title: Remove Database and Related files
toggleCleanup.description: Allow the plugin to cleanup the database and intermediate logs after completion

setdumpdirectory.title: Dump Directory
setdumpdirectory.description: The Directory where the atom plugin will dump before running iTrace.

setoutputdirectory.title: Output Directory
setoutputdirectory.description: The Directory where the output CSV is saved.

algorithm.title: Fixation Algorithm
algorithm.description: Choose the fixation algorithm you wish to apply to the gaze data.

BASIC_window.title: Window size for BASIC filter
BASIC_window.description: The window size for the BASIC fixation filter.

BASIC_radius.title: Radius size for BASIC filter
BASIC_radius.description: The Radius size for the BASIC fixation filter.

BASIC_peak.title: Peak size for BASIC filter
BASIC_peak.description: The peak size for the BASIC fixation filter.

IDT_durationwindow.title: Duration Window for IDT filter
IDT_durationwindow.description: The window duration for the IDT fixation filter.

IDT_dispersion.title: Dispersion for IDT filter
IDT_dispersion.description: The gaze dispersion for the IDT fixation filter.

IVT_velocity.title: Velocity for IVT filter
IVT_velocity.description: The velocity cap for the IVT fixation filter.

IVT_duration.title: Duration for IVT filter
IVT_duration.description: The gaze duration for the IVT fixation filter (milliseconds).

python_path.title: Python Executable Path
python_path.description: The location of your python install (REQUIRED)
